From Anaconda 32bit, run console from your environment section. (hit play button open terminal)

change directory to the dependencies folder, example cmd: cd /D Z:\projects\NFC\py\dependencies
conda install pip
conda install PyQT
pip install pyautogui

# For python 2.7
pip install pyscard-1.9.5-cp27-cp27m-win32.whl

# For python 3.5
pip install pyscard-1.9.5-cp35-cp35m-win32.whl

# For any other version, or 64bit, get the version of pyscard for your environment or compile it.
# I get the pyscard binaries/artifacts from https://ci.appveyor.com/project/LudovicRousseau/pyscard
# click the release fro the right python version and architecture, then click artifacts tab, download the whl file and install with pip
